item.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
item.description:
Social Connections goal is to give singles the opportunity to have fun and increase their circle of friends. We sponsor numerous activities such as dances, house parties, walks, and picnics. We offer a relaxed, comfortable, welcoming atmosphere for you and other singles to socialize and have fun. Many singles attend events as we also advertise in newspapers and other singles venues. You'll find that we are an intelligent, friendly, fun loving group of singles 40 to 60's years old.  Many other singles attend events besides the Meetup members that respond.  We also advertise our activities in newspapers, email over 350 other singles, and leave flyers at other single events in the area.  Come join us at one of our events and find out for yourself!

 

     Annual dues are $40 and the club’s membership year is from January 1st to December 31st.  It includes reduced event fees and emails on upcoming events.  You do not have to pay membership dues to come to any event that Social Connections sponsors. All of our events are open to the public whether you pay dues or not.  If you choose to pay dues, then the event fee will be less.  Send me an email and I will send you a membership form for you to fill out and mail back with your dues payment.

 

See you at an event, Gail
item.name: Singles Social Connections
